00052 void ServerConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &event) {
00053   int command = -1;
00054   int error;
00055 
00056   HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00057 
00058   if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00059     ApplicationHandler *handler = 0;
00060     const uint8_t *msg = event->message;
00061     size_t remaining = event->message_len;
00062 
00063     try {
00064       command = decode_i16(&msg, &remaining);
00065 
00066       // sanity check command code
00067       if (command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00068         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%d)", command);
00069 
00070       if (command != Protocol::COMMAND_HANDSHAKE &&
00071           (error = m_master_ptr->renew_session_lease(m_session_id)) != Error::OK) {
00072         ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00073         HT_INFOF("Session handle %lld expired", m_session_id);
00074         cb.error(error, "");
00075         return;
00076       }
00077 
00078       switch (command) {
00079       case Protocol::COMMAND_HANDSHAKE: {
00080           ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00081           m_session_id = decode_i64(&msg, &remaining);
00082           if (m_session_id == 0)
00083             HT_THROW(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Bad session id: 0");
00084 
00085           cb.response_ok();
00086         }
00087         return;
00088       case Protocol::COMMAND_OPEN:
00089         handler = new RequestHandlerOpen(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00090         break;
00091       case Protocol::COMMAND_CLOSE:
00092         handler = new RequestHandlerClose(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00093         break;
00094       case Protocol::COMMAND_MKDIR:
00095         handler = new RequestHandlerMkdir(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00096         break;
00097       case Protocol::COMMAND_DELETE:
00098         handler = new RequestHandlerDelete(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00099         break;
00100       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRSET:
00101         handler = new RequestHandlerAttrSet(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00102         break;
00103       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRGET:
00104         handler = new RequestHandlerAttrGet(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00105         break;
00106       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRDEL:
00107         handler = new RequestHandlerAttrDel(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00108         break;
00109       case Protocol::COMMAND_EXISTS:
00110         handler = new RequestHandlerExists(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00111         break;
00112       case Protocol::COMMAND_READDIR:
00113         handler = new RequestHandlerReaddir(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00114         break;
00115       case Protocol::COMMAND_LOCK:
00116         handler = new RequestHandlerLock(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00117         break;
00118       case Protocol::COMMAND_RELEASE:
00119         handler = new RequestHandlerRelease(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00120         break;
00121       case Protocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00122         handler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, event);
00123         break;
00124       default:
00125         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%d)", command);
00126       }
00127       m_app_queue_ptr->add(handler);
00128     }
00129     catch (Exception &e) {
00130       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00131       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00132       String errmsg = format("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00133       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errmsg);
00134     }
00135   }
00136   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00137     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00138   }
00139   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::DISCONNECT) {
00140     m_master_ptr->destroy_session(m_session_id);
00141     cout << flush;
00142   }
00143   else {
00144     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00145   }
00146 
00147 }
